gist.summary: Polly upgrades to OpenAI's `text-embedding-small` model and implements hash-based diffing for efficient indexing.
gist.impact: Users will experience more accurate document retrieval and faster processing times due to reduced compute load.
gist.visual_concept: Polly (likely a parrot mascot given the name) interacting with 'smart' glowing books or data. The change is about embeddings (understanding text better) and optimization. A pixel art parrot organizing a glowing library represents this well.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit parrot character organizing glowing magical books on a library shelf. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
